title: Bundle of Horseshoe Balloons
summaries: The Bundle of Horseshoe Balloons is an accessory which combines the functionalities of the Bundle of Balloons and the Lucky Horseshoe.

statistics.Tooltip:
Allows the holder to quadruple jump
Increases jump height and negates fall damage
statistics.Sell: 4
